Content: I will cherish your sacrifice, always.
Steady those hands. You've got this!
You're tougher than this. Breathe.
Steady yerself...
We'll share a tipple when this blows over.
Trust in our methods! In one another!
We shall safeguard one another.
There, there. You've had worse!
Allow the sun scatter your clouds.
We thrill to the spilling of blood!
Keep close! I won't let 'em pick you off!
Don't give in. All is not lost.
You've been down worse roads, my friend.
We'll win the day, you'll see.
The future is a full coffer!
Give up now? With so much yet to learn? BAH!
Hope is the greatest mystery of all, my friend.
Ah, the songs we'll write together...
Spring snows must thaw.
We'll split their guts!
Burn bright, my friend!
Here, try this...
Shoot to kill.
Show them what you're made of!
From my special stash. Use it well.
Have a whiff of these vapours...
A taste of my power - for you.
You hold this little crew together.
My strength is your strength.
We shall revel on their graves!
Don't ask where I learned this.
I can see this arrangement working out.
Here. They'll never see you coming.
Follow my lead!
I'll draw their eye, then you strike!
Our coadjuvancy - their downfall!
We will overcome our demons.
I'll conspire with you any day, heh heh.
There is a place for us in the summer country.
HAVE AT THEM!
I'll stick around - for as long as you'll have me.
Hard to tend your own wounds. Let me.
Patch yourself up. Keep moving.
Learned this in the trenches...
Something for your nerves, dear?
This should work...
Allow me to mend that.
Cheer up. Or don't. Hehe.
Pain can be a teacher, if you let it.
All part of the hunt!
Street medicine.
Not you. Not now. Not yet.
C'mon... don't you die on me.
... A loss I couldn't take.
I prefer your body intact, love.
At my side, you shall forever defy death!
I shall read to you while you recover.
You are the rose. I am the thorn.
I am not yet ready to relinquish you.
Those wounds will make handsome scars!
Burn bright, my darling!
Drive them back!
One knife in the front, one in the back!
A pincer maneuver! Flank them!
Where'd you learn to dance like that?
Defenses rendered invalid!
Can you feel it? A charge in the air...
PUNCHLINE!
Thunder follows lightning.
SLAY THEM!
Ha! We make this look easy.
That is how it's done!
*appreciative whistle*
A drubbing they won't soon forget!
Dearie, you're a natural!
Let us end these aberrations!
THEY ARE INSECTS BEFORE US.
That move always got a laugh at court.
You are a worthy partner, indeed.
We shall sing them to their graves!
Let 'er rip!
They'll regret that!
Pay me back later.
We advance together or not at all!
*wink*
Retaliation!
You'd do the same for me, hm?
Made you look.
Survive the sting - fear the swarm.
They shall CHOKE on our WRATH!
Get back!
Not on my watch!
We need you at your best.
Not if I'm still standing!
I admit it. I'd miss you.
You're too useful to lose to these vermin!
A valued ally repaid in kind.
I've decided - you don't get to die.
A blow I am happy to take.
Blood for blood!
I owed you one. Not that I'm keepin' track.
Catch your breath. I'm here.
I got this.
I'll hold them off!
This seat taken?
Perhaps a diversion is in order...
Something in me hungers for a fight...
Bah - I'm quicker anyhow!
Fall back. I can take this punishment.
Bloodsong rises on the wind...!
I'll distract 'em!
I'd suffer worse for you.
Mm, like knowing you owe me one.
I've lost many, but I won't lose you.
This is my kind of foreplay.
I won't gamble on your health!
Fate has better things in store for us.
And ruin my plans for you tonight?! Pfah!
This is not where you fall.
They will NOT touch you...!
These bastards gotta learn you're all MINE!
You're gambling with our fates!
We're all safer with you in the dirt.
Foul my formation no longer!
I've known some laggards in my time...
I've better things to do than supervise you!
You're more useful as bait.
If I break your knees, they'll get you first.
Press me no further.
ONE MORE STEP, I CHALLENGE YE!
I know where you sleep.
Suffer.
One step closer. I dare you.
Stand down, greenling!
You'll wish I'd killed you quickly.
INSUFFERABLE!
RrrrRGH. Hnagotha ILYAA'A!
Who's laughing now?
Mistake my calm for weakness at your peril.
Die or flee, I care not!
You won't last out here.
You can't give up now!
This will pass. Swear it.
Chin up! We've suffered worse.
Darkest before dawn an' all that.
The effects of overwork, nothing more.
Stay close. We are almost through.
I'll keep goin' if you do - deal?
You are far from lost.
I know you have another swing in you!
Persist! Keep moving!
People depend on us now.
Survive. The rest'll shake out.
I'll carry you 'cross these trenches if I must.
A better world. You think it possible?
I'm not finished yet. Nor are you!
We have much to learn from one another.
We should simply refuse to die here.
No feeling is final.
We may die, but what a death...!
You calm me down. Really.
Your strength is a boon to us all.
We'll send 'em to hell - together.
We fight as one!
I've a fondness for you. Continue breathing.
Dispsense with this fear!
Power, heart, hope - let mine carry you.
You're growing on me.
You keep us on an even keel.
The fire in our hearts will BLACK THEIR BONES!
We won't leave you behind.
Come a little closer.
How'd you get me so sweet on you?
This old dog has a few tricks left...
I am spoilt to have you.
You are beyond appraisal!
The void calls - we shall defy it.
Look at you - shining while the world rots.
Stand watch with me later, under the stars.
How their blood shines on you...
Keep me warm tonight, will you?
Fools, we were...
Damned souls one and all.
What were we thinking...?
All shall be dust. Even us.
Disease. Rot. Putrescence. All of it.
One can only push a mind so far...
Heroics? What were we thinking?
Our world - fallen, unrecognizable.
IDIOT!
I was safer on the streets...
I question your motives.
And show my back to you? Never.
You think yourself our general, do you?
Your intent is questionable, like your aim.
You conspire against me!
You have a most malevolent aura.
Hands where I can watch 'em.
A snake in the grass...
CHICKEN'S HEART! You plan to abandon us!
You ask too many questions.
A charmed one, you are.
I'm nobody's mark.
It's clear you've got it all figured out.
Well la de bloody da.
A confluence of confidence and ineptitude!
Water-fat and unreliable, you are.
If you're so smart, you drive the coach.
Watch your footing, braggart.
*spits* Pteh.
You get all the good loot!
You're just taking up space.
Are you even on our side?!
What addle-brain trained you?!
Our luck has turned since we took you on.
These are MY friends! You aim to steal them!
I doubt your allegiance, friend.
Hah! Hahah! Oh, goodness.
The sea erodes, the coast crumbles.
Milk-drunk weakling!
Keep up or get left behind!
Get out of my face, tottering bespawler.
I've wet my blade for less...
Blast you!
Byspelt! Be you daft or simply a coward?
You are a walking HEADACHE!
R'luhz ngy'haaAAH!
None of us would miss you.
Press not past the bounds of my patience.
You'd have been culled as a whelp.
You may fool the others, but not me.
This might be of some help!
Let me lend a hand.
You got this. Be ready.
Steel yerself!
Something from the snuff box?
Sniff this - to balance the humours!
The stars are, at times, benevolent.
Oh, I'll cheer you on if I must.
Find strength in the fray, friend.
Spirits at your back!
Don't say I never gave you nothin'.
A blessing, if you're in need.
Behind me!
I'll draw them over!
They won't get past me!
I've got you.
Behind my shield! Now!
I'll cut down any who try.
Stand back! I'm testing a method...!
If you'd permit my assistance...
Oho, not without a fight.
A momentary respite.
Try your luck with me, fiends!
Quick, get down!
You are under my aegis.
It isn't your time, not yet.
Hold fast!
It doesn't end here.
Retreat if ye can!
Look at you - inspiring heroics!
Bodies can be mended!
Fate has other things in store for you.
Allow me to draw their ire.
Death is not to be feared, but let us not hurry it.
Hold fast - I am your armour!
Get up, damn you! You're not done!
Hold on! A better end awaits us!
Fear not, I will stop them.
Tend to your wounds. I'll hold them off!
I'll hold 'em while you right yourself.
I trained with this shield for a reason!
Don't squander my altruism, hm?
Wounded, yes, but breathing!
Let the unseen ward us...
Relax. I'm sturdier than I look.
At my side you are safe.
My rage is yours!
I won't let 'em catch you!
Take shelter behind me.
Look, I can share!
For you, friend!
Here!
Take your time. Take aim.
Listen here and follow my lead!
Try a sip of this. Steadies the hand.
Allow me to fortify your constitution!
My power is yours.
Look! A weak spot!
As light parts the fog...
Flay them from end to end!
See? I ain't all bad.
There is strength in you. Find it.
We're beating them back!
As one!
That's how it's done.
See? We fight as a unit!
I'm charmed.
A synchronized dissection!
Snuff them out!
What a pair, you and I.
None of us fights alone.
Chase them back to their dens!
Send 'em home limping!
Back to the void which birthed ye!
They underestimate us!
We shall be their undoing!
On 'em like a pack of dogs!
This is what we trained for!
Brilliant!
We weary them!
They'll be feeling that one.
I trained as a soloist, but...
Many are the hands that dig their graves.
STRIKE WHERE THEY ALREADY BLEED!
Hah! Not so fast!
Together we overwhelm the enemy!
Few more like that and they're done for!
Hah!
I line 'em up...
Warmed the buggers up for you!
You're dreadful good at this.
Masterful!
I admire your cunning.
On three...
As the stream smooths the stone.
GRAAAAAH!
Don't let a single one flee!
They fear the glare of our torch!
They'll be scared of US soon!
Well done!
Now we're fightin' dirty!
Now! On the offensive!
Hammer on the nail, you are.
They are enfeebled! Now!
Now we know what weakens them...
Got one over on 'em!!
The tide turns.
Never saw you coming!
Yes! Now, again!
Banish them!
Back in the fray with you!
You'll live!
What's a little blood, eh.
On you go!
There. Good as gold.
Cease your wriggling and let me work!
Allow me.
I'll fix that if you stop bleeding on me.
This pain of yours - it has a purpose.
You will spill more blood yet!
Lemme get that.
Close your eyes a moment, friend.
Surrender not!
Not if I have a say in it!
Get up. You're tougher than this.
On your feet!
Not while I still need you.
I conquered death once - I can do so again!
It is not your time.
You can't leave me short-handed.
Our journey has not reached its end.
You're no weakling!
No! C'mon! Don't give in!
Trust in the Light and each other.
You're still in this fight, friend!
That one looks deep.
Can't leave you hangin', can I?
What are comrades for?
T'ain't pretty, but it will hold.
None better for your wounds than I!
This may hurt.
We'll fix it up proper on the coach later.
You take punishment well.
We look after one another!
Can't have you flagging!
Let me read you a verse...
You aren't so bad.
Much appreciated, friend.
Well, well.
Seize the opening! There!
I do love it when people avenge me.
Skill and coordination!
Were you using me as bait? Hah.
That'll do!
It is a blessing to fight alone no longer.
We will best them as one!
Phew, that'll show 'em.
My thanks.
I want that one's head!
Before it can call any allies!
Gut the bastards.
Show them your mettle!
Marvelous. Make them bleed!
You'd do that for me...?
Deepest thanks.
I'm touched.
Even a worm will turn - and you are no worm.
Smell that! The wind turns!
I wouldn't ask that of you... but thanks.
Only together do we stand a chance!
Come! This way!
Pardon, friend.
A good ambush is all preparation.
Positions, all! Form up!
Let me slip past, hm?
I have an idea!
This position may prove an advantage.
And a one and a two...
I am needed here.
We can rush them from anywhere!
Trust me on this!
I know what I'm doing!
For your agonies.
That looks painful.
Here!
Pay me back later, eh?
That ought to do it!
You're in fine hands - promise.
I'm sure I have an ampoule for that...
Be still! This is my specialty!
Not your finest moment. Here.
We prevent suffering where we can.
This mud cures maladies! Trust me!
I can patch that up!
Let the warmth suffuse you...
Return to us!
Clamber back from the precipice!
Bite down on somethin'. This might hurt.
Stay with us!
I'm no physic, but let me try!
Move not an inch! I'm working!
Thought we'd lost you.
Cuttin' it close, friend.
Playing dice with fortune herself.
Is it not freeing, standing on the edge?!
Don't scare us like that.
Even these wounds can be mended.
No! I will not allow this!
The pain persists, but you'll live!
That looks nasty. Here.
Mind your wounds!
Here, lest ye grow faint.
We caught this in time. Here!
Don't let that run rampant.
Fine. From my stash.
Wise not to let this fester.
Foul spirits! Miasma in the air!
That could spread. Let me.
You require aid - I provide it.
There will be time for grief later.
You cannot afford to dwell on this!
You're a sturdy sort - press on.
None doubt you.
Keep your eyes on the prize.
Verdure and vigour!
Your dismay echoes my own - but onward!
Think on it - you ain't died yet.
Much beauty remains in this world.
I'll drag you through this myself!
Shake it off!
There is comfort in times of unease.
Breathe in. Focus.
Steel your mind. The battle is not yet over.
All is not lost.
We need you!
One foot in front of the other.
We leave none behind!
A faintheart you are not.
We will cure this world.
Move beyond fear. I know you can.
Don't count yourself out.
Trust in me if you can't trust yourself.
Oust the fear from your heart!
Hold on - just a little longer.
I see the good in you.
You never aid ME!
Clearly I've no part in your plan.
I see how it is.
Tactically unwise!
Hmph! Suit yourself.
By my calculations, you misjudged that.
You may regret that.
Am I a joke to you?
Swift to aid the others...
Soft-skull!
Nobody listens to me anyway.
Think yourself so wise, hm?
I see that I must get by without your help.
You see me suffer and do nothing...!
No help over here?
You deploy our strength unwisely!
I will continue bleeding, I suppose.
Inefficient!
A fell omen, that.
Did I tick you off somehow?
*quiet grumble*
I cannot fight if you let me die!
Good thing I expected no help.
I surely require it more.
I sit on the brink - and for what?
If this be the end, you'll regret it.
Mistake it was, counting on you.
If we lose this day, it's at your feet!
I deserved better.
If I bleed out, who will staunch your wounds?
So you'd sacrifice me? I see.
I'll carry on alone, thanks.
You sentence me to death.
Buffoon!
What am I worth to you?!
If I expire, you shall rue the day.
Am I of no use...?
All this talk of teamwork...
Forgot about me?
Overlooked once again.
Trust me so little, do you?
You wouldn't know good leadership!
I shall make do without.
Reckless!
You fear my strength.
We'll see who's laughing when you need help!
The jackal stalks alone.
Jealous of me, are you?!
Fine! I don't need you!
It's as though you wish me weak.
You gorge yourself on food that should be MINE!
Get your paws off my feast!
That banquet is not for you!
A delectable gift from the Gods, but for ME!
You have no idea how I've starved...
I require that! For my strength!
And I thought I was a glutton.
I require nourishment!
I have hunger beyond your ken.
You don't get to take this from me!
My constitution wanes...
I'll sever your greedy hands!
Don't leave me your damned scraps!
This feast is a blessing, you selfish lout!
And what of my needs?
Are my wounds not enough?
You think me unworthy?
You never did respect me...
I was wise to never trust you.
You leave your own medic to bleed!
I am slow to anger, but...
I mistook you.
*shakes head*
FORSAKEN!
That was your last chance!
You spurn me in my time of need!
Do you not see me bleed?!
How dare you!
Do I look so far gone?
I am not beyond saving!
No help coming from you, I see.
Your eyes must be afflicted!
A traitor in our midst, perhaps.
You'll see no aid from me either.
Respect comes hard-earned...
You aid our enemies by ignoring me!
... I thought you were different.
After all I've done for you!
Was I not enough...?
Abandoned at the end...!
Never trusted you.
Leave the old man to die, is it?
I'm not enough, then? So be it.
A poor distribution of aid!
Toying with our fates, I see.
I'll carry on bleeding, then.
The king on his side upon the board...
ROT, THEN!
My gut was right about you.
Who will tend your wounds when I am gone?
Don't jostle me!
Pardon me?
I was lining up a shot!
You're out of formation!
You oaf! They'll spy me now!
What is the meaning of this?!
You presume much.
What's the matter - don't trust me?
I know where I am most useful.
You have not earned the right!
I don't recall takin' orders from you.
Cease this nervous skittering!
That ought to have been mine!
My trusted ally, indeed...
Share the wealth, eh?
I could have used that!
None for me? Terribly rude.
You think yourself so smart...!
Test fate at your own risk.
Think I'm useless, do you?
I require aid same as any hale soldier.
Don't let me grow weak...!
I ought to leave you in the dust...
By risking me you imperil us all!
I needed that!
You're no friend of mine!
Not the first time I've been left bleeding.
A unit is only as strong as its weakest arm...
Left to my own devices again!
You FOOL!
I have a long memory...
I'll sort myself out, then.
Hmph.
Who shall hold the line then?!
Thought you had my back.
You'll rue the day!
While I breathe my last...?
Here I suffer, unaided...
Fine. Leave me to the fate I deserve...
I see my trust was misplaced.
P...please, no! You'd leave me to die?!
You'll be sorry when I'm gone!
Unwise.
So it's come to this.
Passing judgment on my health, are you?
You'd sacrifice me?!
I trusted you! NO!!
Left me to fend for myself, have you?
Our burden is heavy - you lighten it.
I never tire of your stories.
Another round?
I dare say, you lend me hope.
You've got something the others don't.
The worse it gets, the more we'll need each other.
Think I have some dice rattling around in here...
C'mere.
Pass that here. I'll mend it.
Another story? Glad you asked...
Share a flask? I'm parched.
They broke the mold with you.
At last! Someone I can work with!
Think of all we can teach these people!
You tell such intriguing stories.
Pass the snuff box, would you?
Heh heh. Good one.
Tell you 'bout my travels? Suppose I can.
My story? I suppose, for you...
You are a rock in troublesome times.
The horses like you. A good omen.
Born under the right moon, you were!
I like you when you're quiet.
You ain't so bad.
Sit and read with me?
Maintain your calm. I can help.
Tell me it's going to be all right?
Truly, you believe this fight is winnable?
Let us relax together at the inn...
I trust you not to disappoint me.
We'll look out for one another.
If you need me, simply ask.
I expected to die alone. Not... this.
You're a bright spot.
Glad to have you toiling at my side.
Imagine how lost we'd be without ye.
You speak so certainly of a future...
Spare a conversation? It's... too quiet.
Do not let me grow morbid...
My mind is troubled. Read with me?
You're an old soul.
Been some time since I had a friend.
You're a good egg.
Can you carry a tune?
Help me with my wounds...?
The rarest gem in this world - a kind heart.
Cook with me! Share the spoils!
Let me paint your face!
Couldn't do this without ya.
You're all right.
I feel it, yes - but we cannot give in.
Stand firm! Resist the dark!
Keep to the light. We'll persevere.
Together, we can prevail.
Don't look out. Look at me.
A drink to take the edge off?
Pleasant company, if ye be my last.
If we go, we go together.
Sit with me. I'm... tense.
Y'have no idea how much I needed that.
Promise me it ain't for naught?
You're right - I shouldn't fret.
You're a welcome distraction.
For me? Why... thank you.
You have taught me much.
Here - you've got splatter on you.
Let us tend the torch together.
What's that? I was being "morose"?
... Good one.
Clever head on those shoulders.
Yours is a soul of worth.
No - you deserve to be here same as I.
My birthplace calls to me...
The end bears down. Let us face it!
How do you do it? Keep fighting?
Sorry for snappin' at ya.
Some days I fear we are on the losing side...
... You shouldn't have. Thank you.
Surely there are chores that need doing.
Do I look like I'm here to make friends?
Spare me the nattering.
I need my rest!
My waterskin! You nabbed it!
This journey was taxing enough before you.
Tend to your own business.
Leave me be.
I don't question your every decision!
Yer troublesome. Shoo.
Off with ye!
I'm reading! Do you even know what that is?
Leave me to my studies!
Don't make an enemy of your physiker!
Be wary of prying, friend.
Respect my silence, please.
Oh, you're no fun.
Goodness, who let you aboard?
*annoyed huff*
Make yourself useful.
Like a horse-fly, you are!
I was saving that for later!
Can't say I trust you yet.
Why you want to know so much about me?
I find your hygiene troubling.
You may sit beside me, but be quiet.
You're a curse upon this voyage.
Our luck turned when we picked you up.
That's my bunk! Off!
Drunkard! Keep your wits about you!
You cowardly seek-sorrow!
Trust not a word this one speaks!
You'll double-cross me. I'm sure.
Accuse me of cheatin' one more time...
Fate has sent you here to torment me.
I might be old but I'll still tan yer hide.
You remind me of someone I once loathed.
Take your trifling matters elsewhere.
Have you no sense? I said BEGONE.
You bicker as a child does!
I am a patient man, but I have my limits.
*long-suffering sigh*
Your presence is a drain.
You exhaust me.
Begone. I have suffered long already.
Allow a tired man his rest.
Those who sit beside me must EARN it.
You've a coward's stink on you!
I was better off alone.
I regret ever opening up to you.
Mistake me not for a friend.
Babble at someone else. I'm resting.
Save your bile for our enemies!
You wear on my nerves...!
All life will soon be lost - especially yours!
Was there no one capable left...?
If I gut you now, more food for me.
If you're the best we've got, 'tis hopeless.
Get your boot off my bunk if you value that foot.
What's wrong? Look outside. You daft?
Has a man not earned some peace?
Sod off if ye know what's best!
Any company but yours.
I find your attempts at comfort patronizing.
You! Reckless! You threaten us all!
I've had better company in the morgue!
Pester someone else.
Test me and suffer the consequences.
Entertain yourself. I'm done.
Won't let YOU of all people crash my pity party.
*tense breathing*
You anger the wrong man.
I'll carve out your tongue!
I won't hear a word from you!
... Not now. Leave me alone.
I'll melt your gloves to your hands!
Do I interrupt your prayers?
Away with you. Meditate on your failings.
Why do we tarry and invite danger?
We are wasting time with this rabble!
Let's finish these scum and move on.
We're giving them time to regroup...
We're wasting torchlight!
Let's be done with this.
We're leaving ourselves open to ambush.
Don't dally! We have to keep moving!
No good can come from toying with these creatures.
Back to the coach, lest we draw more!
Can't staunch the flow...
There will be no blood left for the leeches!
That one got me deep...
So much... blood...!
I need a bandage!
Someone apply pressure!
Help me wrap this?
It's not letting up...
Getting dizzy...
I feel unsteady...!
My veins are burning...!
I... feel... faint...
Antivenom! NOW!
My heart will burst...!
*ragged, unsteady breathing*
Everything's blurry...
The fever burns...!
It's under my skin!
Getting... hard to breathe...
Please, an antidote...
AAAGH!
*hiss*
Put it out! PUT IT OUT!
Something for these blisters...!
It burns! It burns!
Is that... my skin?!
The smell...! Gods, I'm burning!
Not my face!
Salve, a poultice, ANYTHING!
H-hello, old friend...
Mmm, how it BURNS!
The whispers...
What am I doing here?!
No, no...! Get back!
The floor seems to pitch and buckle!
They can sense my weakness!
Steady... steady...
D-did you see that?
They're in my head...!
Doomed from the start...
They're closing in...!
This expedition is doomed!
This cannot continue...
*breathes heavily*
I... this... I can't...
